thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1722
thread.title: France

author: France
title: France
text: Flighthub website is easy to navigate through, really appreciate seeing all the options when selecting a flight making life so easier. If there is one thing that I should advice whoever is in the process to purchase a flight for instance, is to always be cautious regarding the price shown either in canadian or us dollar so not to get too excited and to avoid any later deception.
